title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Cabinetry, Lighting", 1934–35
inscribed: Dimensions at far upper left showing width: 35 7/8 "; Dimension of height at upper right: 37 34 3/4"; height of lower half of panel: 37 5/8; Center panel inscription: LIGHT; width of center panel: 62 1/4; width of panel at right in upper portion: 36 3/4 "; height of upper portion: 34 3/4"; width of panel in lower portion: 38 1/4"; width at right: 3 1/4; height of overall cabinetry: 6 '.
description: Plan for cabinetry and lighting for Lady Esther Yacht with dimensions. Three panels; right half of left panel divided near center, center panel contains light, right panel divided at center. Side panels might be shelving units.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Cabinetry, Lighting", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on cream paper, burned. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-312-7.
